00178 inline void DataSet::addSample (const Sample& sample)
00179 {
00180     if ( sample.first.size() not_eq nFeatures_ )
00181         throw NessieException ("DataSet::addSample() : The number of features in the sample is different from the one in data set.");
00182     else
00183     {
00184         samples_.push_back(sample);
00185         size_ = samples_.size();
00186     }       
00187 };
00188 
00189 
00190 inline const DataSet::Sample& DataSet::getSample (const unsigned int& iSample) const
00191 {
00192     return samples_.at(iSample);
00193 };
